document_data.name: Karmandon's Finery
document_data.mainbody: '''Karmandon's Finery''' was a clothing and jewelry shop in [[Eileanar]] up till [[Karsus's Folly]] in {{Yearlink|-339}}.
document_data.Services: [[Karmandon]] sold fine clothing and jewelry that made up complete fashion ensembles. His business started to suffer due to the superior practices of [[Chanragoupta's Exotic]], and he responded by spreading scurrilous rumors to sink [[Chanragoupta]]'s reputation.
